caller_intent: David needs to update his apartment insurance policy due to a move on August 1st and requires an updated evidence of insurance to send to someone for moving in.
resolution_steps: Heather confirms David's identity and current policy details (policy number ending in 703, current address: 102 Village Drive, Apartment 317).
David provides new address: 102 Village Drive, Apartment 411, and confirms move date as August 1st.
Heather notes the policy is also listed under 'Rondo's name' and confirms the email address (David.McGirt@CooperEIC.com).
Heather assures David she will send the updated evidence of insurance via email.
knowledge_required: Updating insurance policies for address changes
Generating and sending evidence of insurance documents
Accessing customer policy details and contact information
summary: David contacted Alliance Insurance to update his apartment insurance policy due to a move on August 1st. Heather confirmed his current policy details, new address, and email, and committed to sending updated evidence of insurance. The call concluded with David expressing gratitude.
